title: Blademaster/gunslinger synergy?
body: Does each extra attack from the blademaster bonus give you a chance to hit multiple targets from gunslinger?  And does each gunslinger extra shot stack wild bonus?  With Graves, the gunslinger bonus makes him attack multiple times, instead of all at once... is it different for him?

replies.body: I know that any extra attack will stack with wild bonus, but despite using bladeslinger a good amount I'm honestly not sure if its multiple chances to apply the AoE shot.  I'm going to assume yes though since its often a massive powerspike when you turn someone like Jinx or Lucian into a Blademaster, they're getting 40% attack speed and bonus strikes and they usually AoE a lot.  Most on-hits from what I can tell benefit from the bonus attack so it'd make sense if it works the same for Gunslinger, regardless if that's the case they're a good partner synergy because of Gangplank.
